nodes.text: LFA was a business operating in Saleucami town that was advertised by a glowing sign.

The name of the business was developed as Aurebesh letters written on a billboard in "Cut and Run," the second episode of Star Wars: The Bad Batch. Although the billboard can be seen in the episode, the letters identifying the business aren't visible. The name was later revealed in a concept art image included in the episode guide for "Cut and Run" on StarWars.com.
